events.title: Events
events.desc: Workshops, webinars, and events by TensorLab. Join us to learn and build together.

overview.tag: What is an AI Application Engineer?
overview.title: The most in-demand role in the AI industry
overview.desc: AI Application Engineers build end-to-end AI applications — from LLM integration, RAG pipeline design, to production deployment. No PhD or research background needed — just coding skills and the ability to connect AI tools together.

highlights.title: Chatbot & Virtual Assistant
highlights.desc: Build intelligent chatbots that answer based on your company's data, supporting customers 24/7.

highlights.title: RAG-powered Search
highlights.desc: Create semantic search systems on internal documents — more accurate than traditional keyword search.

highlights.title: AI Agents & Automation
highlights.desc: Design AI agents that automate complex tasks: data analysis, report generation, code review.

whatYouLearn.title: Master knowledge from basics to advanced
whatYouLearn.desc: After this course, you'll have the skills to build real AI applications.

items.title: Understand the big picture
items.desc: Know what an AI Application Engineer does, what to learn, and how components connect.

items.title: 6 phases, 18 topics
items.desc: From LLM Fundamentals, RAG, Orchestration, Agents to Production and Advanced topics.

items.title: Hands-on with Demos
items.desc: Each topic includes real demos you can run and understand how things work.

items.title: Build a Side Project
items.desc: While learning theory, you'll build a real product applying what you've learned.

whoShouldAttend.title: This webinar is for you if
items: You're a developer wanting to transition into AI/ML applications
You know web/app development and want to integrate AI into products
You want to understand how to build chatbots, RAG, AI agents from scratch
You're looking for job opportunities in the AI field
whoShouldAttend.notFor: Note: This is beginner-friendly content. You need at least basic programming knowledge.

agenda.title: 6-Phase Roadmap
agenda.desc: Learn sequentially from basics to advanced, each phase includes slides, docs and source code.

items.title: LLM Fundamentals
items.desc: Prompt Engineering, JSON Mode, Streaming, Model Selection

items.title: RAG
items.desc: Embeddings, Vector Database, Chunking Strategies

items.title: Orchestration
items.desc: Memory Management, Chains, Routing Logic

items.title: Agents
items.desc: Tool Calling, ReAct Pattern, Agent Workflows

items.title: Production
items.desc: Evaluation, Observability, Cost Optimization, Security

items.title: Advanced
items.desc: Multi-modal, Fine-tuning, Local Deployment

items.title: Lecture Slides
items.desc: Detailed slides for each topic, easy to follow and review.

items.title: Markdown Docs
items.desc: Detailed docs explaining theory and best practices.

items.title: FE/BE Source Code
items.desc: Ready-to-run Next.js + NestJS sample code.

items.title: Project Ideas
items.desc: 4 project ideas with step-by-step guidelines to practice.

cta.title: Ready to start your journey?
cta.desc: Join now to get all materials and start learning AI Application Engineer.

overview.title: Vibe Coding
overview.subtitle: Build real web apps using natural language only. No coding skills, no tool installation, no deployment needed — just a Gmail account.

noCode.title: No coding required
noCode.desc: Describe what you want in plain language, and AI writes the code. No syntax, no frameworks, no programming knowledge needed.

noSetup.title: No setup needed
noSetup.desc: Everything runs in the browser with Google AI Studio — 100% free. All you need is a Gmail account.

noDeploy.title: No deployment
noDeploy.desc: Your app runs instantly in the browser. No hosting, no server. Share a link with anyone to use it.

whatYouLearn.title: From idea to real application
whatYouLearn.desc: After this workshop, you'll be able to build web apps — even if you've never written a single line of code.

items.title: Understanding Vibe Coding
items.desc: Programming with natural language — the transformative power that AI brings to everyone in this era.

items.title: Mastering Google AI Studio
items.desc: Learn the most powerful free tool: interface, annotation mode, system instructions, and AI chips.

items.title: Effective Prompt Writing
items.desc: Standard prompt structures for each app type: CRUD, games, landing pages, portfolios — with ready-made prompt templates.

items.title: Google Sheets Integration
items.desc: Turn static apps into dynamic ones: read data from Google Sheets, auto-update without touching code.

whoShouldAttend.title: This workshop is for you if
items: You want to build apps but don't know how to code and don't want to learn
You're an office worker, marketer, or content creator wanting to build your own tools
You're a small business owner wanting a landing page or management app without hiring a dev
You're a student, freelancer, or anyone who wants to turn ideas into real products
You've tried ChatGPT/Gemini but don't know how to create complete applications
whoShouldAttend.onlyNeed: Only requirement: A Gmail account and a web browser. No programming knowledge needed whatsoever.

agenda.title: 10 Parts — From basics to real-world practice
agenda.desc: Learn by doing — each part includes live demos for you to follow along.

items.title: Understanding Vibe Coding
items.desc: What is natural language programming? The power of AI and use cases across every industry.

items.title: Popular Tools
items.desc: Comparing Lovable, Bolt.new, v0, Replit, and Google AI Studio. Why choose Google AI Studio?

items.title: Power Demo
items.desc: Quickly build a Mini Game, Data Dashboard, Landing Page — with just a few Vietnamese commands.

items.title: Google AI Studio Basics
items.desc: Input area, Preview panel, split-screen mode, and essential features.

items.title: Deep Dive Google AI Studio
items.desc: Annotation Mode, System Instructions, AI Chips (image gen, Google Maps, search, code execution).

items.title: Effective Prompt Writing
items.desc: Standard prompt structure and template prompts for each app type: CRUD, Games, Content pages.

items.title: Style & UI Design
items.desc: 20+ ready-made styles, reverse engineering from existing designs, building your own visual style.

items.title: Preparing Assets
items.desc: Images, icons, illustrations, fonts, colors — all free, high-quality resource collections.

items.title: Google Sheets Integration
items.desc: Turn static apps into dynamic ones: real-time data, advanced API, practical use cases.

items.title: Real-World Tips
items.desc: Costs, security, limitations of vibe coding, and how to make the most of it.

items.title: Prompt Templates
items.desc: 20+ ready-made prompts for each app type: landing pages, dashboards, games, portfolios...

items.title: UI Style Collection
items.desc: 20+ design styles for every use case, plus templates to build your own visual identity.

items.title: Design Resources
items.desc: Curated list of free, high-quality images, icons, fonts, and color tools ready to use.

items.title: Google Sheets API Guide
items.desc: Step-by-step tutorial to integrate dynamic data from Google Sheets into your app.

cta.title: Ready to build your first app?
cta.desc: Join the workshop to build a real app in just a few hours — even if you've never written code before.

hero.subtitle: TensorLab supports you from architecture consulting and product development to production operations. Partner with us via:
hero.previewCaption: Product delivery • Tech consulting • AI enablement

capabilities.title: From consulting to production delivery
capabilities.desc: Outcome-focused delivery with fast time-to-market and long-term operability.

consulting.title: Tech & architecture consulting
consulting.desc: Architecture, technical roadmap, quality standards, and delivery plan aligned to business goals.

dx.title: Digital transformation & operations
dx.desc: Process standardization, system integration, workflow automation, and data enablement to improve efficiency.

product.title: End-to-end product build
product.desc: Discovery, UI/UX, MVP, then scale. Optimized for maintainability, speed, and cost awareness.

ai.title: AI enablement: from POC to production
ai.desc: RAG/knowledge base, agent, recommendations… with MLOps/monitoring

web3.title: Web3 & access control
web3.desc: dApps, wallet integrations, token gating, RBAC & audit logs — with security and UX as priorities.

cloud.title: Cloud, DevOps & operations
cloud.desc: CI/CD, observability, scaling, hardening, and cost optimization for stable production.

scrollReveal.headline: Ship production ready digital products fast, stable, and easy to scale. Clear architecture, clean UX, and delivery you can confidently operate.

engagement.title: Two ways to partner with TensorLab
engagement.desc: Choose the model that fits: product co-build or outsource delivery.

product.title: Product partnership
product.subtitle: Co-build with outcome ownership and fast iteration.
items: Best when you need a co-build partner from MVP to scale with shared quality ownership.
We cover discovery, architecture, build & operations — not just task execution.
Flexible models: milestone-based, co-build, or long-term — tailored to your context.

outsource.title: Outsource
outsource.subtitle: Dedicated team / project-based / augmentation.
items: Engage via dedicated team, project-based, or augmentation.
Roles: PM/BA, UI/UX, FE, BE, Mobile, AI Engineer, DevOps.
Transparent delivery: weekly updates, demos, PR reviews, QA checklists, and clear handover docs.

process.title: Clear and transparent delivery process
process.desc: Ship the right things, ensure quality, and scale confidently.

discovery.title: Discovery & problem framing
discovery.desc: Align on goals, users, constraints, and success metrics. Confirm MVP scope or phased plan.

architecture.title: Solution & architecture
architecture.desc: Design solution, data flows, security, and cloud setup. Choose the right stack and trade-offs.

delivery.title: Sprint-based delivery
delivery.desc: Build in sprints with regular demos and impact measurement. Prioritize value-first.

release.title: QA, release & observability
release.desc: Test strategy, release pipeline, logging/monitoring, alerting — for stable production operations.

scale.title: Maintain & scale
scale.desc: Optimize performance, cost, and security; evolve with roadmap. Clean handover for your internal team.

eventsHighlight.title: Upcoming events
eventsHighlight.desc: Workshops, webinars, and events by TensorLab. Join us to learn and build together.

insights.title: Few posts, high quality
insights.desc: We write less, but we write deep and practical.

rag.title: From POC to production RAG: common pitfalls
rag.desc: A practical RAG playbook: ingestion, chunking, evaluation, monitoring, and reducing hallucinations in enterprise contexts.

multitenant.title: Multi-tenant architecture: scale with cost control
multitenant.desc: Tenant models, data isolation, RBAC/audit logs, and trade-offs that directly impact cost and operability.

dxImpact.title: Digital transformation: how to measure real impact
dxImpact.desc: Set the right KPIs, prioritize workflows, and deliver in phases to avoid turning projects into a black hole.

commitments.title: Why TensorLab?
commitments.desc: Core values we bring to every project.

ownership.title: True ownership
ownership.desc: Not just coding to task — we join discovery, advise on trade-offs, and take responsibility for the final outcome.

transparency.title: Full transparency
transparency.desc: Weekly updates, regular demos, open code reviews, and clear handover docs. You always know the progress.

production.title: Production-first
production.desc: Designed for real operations from day one: monitoring, CI/CD, security, logging, and scalability.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.desc: Didn’t find your answer? Leave a note and we’ll get back to you.

f1.q: Is TensorLab a good fit if I’m not sure about technical requirements yet?
f1.a: Yes. We can start with a short Discovery to clarify goals, scope, and propose a suitable solution/roadmap before building.

f2.q: How do you manage progress and quality for outsourcing?
f2.a: Sprint/weekly transparency: updates, demos, PR reviews, QA checklists, and handover docs. We can adapt to your existing tools.

f3.q: How is product partnership different from typical outsourcing?
f3.a: Product partnership emphasizes long-term collaboration and outcome ownership: framing the problem, advising on trade-offs, and ensuring operability.

f4.a: We can sign an NDA upfront. Access control to repos/environments, secret management, and audit/logging practices are aligned early.

f5.q: Do you actually do AI/Web3 or is it just buzzwords?
f5.a: We do, when it fits. For AI we focus on valuable use-cases and reliable production (eval/monitoring). For Web3 we prioritize security and UX.

finalCta.title: Ready to start with TensorLab?
finalCta.desc: Send a brief or book a 30-minute call — we’ll review the problem and propose an optimal delivery approach.
